title: Worlds Icon
body: Is it too late to upgrade a Worlds Summoner Icon? If not how do I go about doing it?

replies.body:
Nope, it's not too late. You can upgrade the icon by grabbing *Championship Jewel Tokens* during broadcast days and using the Championship Jewels for upgrading your token in the *Hextech Crafting* menu. 

You can find our guide on this [here.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/226192107-2016-Worlds-Guide-Crafting-championship-skins-and-more-) Let me know if you have any questions.
You can still upgrade the Worlds icons if you have enough [jewels](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/worlds-2016-hits-rift).
